Friday 11th July 2025 6pm - 11pm

howmuch:
£6 door entry (includes glass)
Tokens are £2 each
1 token for a half pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a single gin
4 tokens for a double gin
Soft Drinks are FREE

location.address: Lymm Village Hall, Pepper Street, Lymm, WA13 0JB

food: Food will be available to purchase

brews.Description: New England pale ale brewed with Citra, Galaxy & Mosaic. Built on an oaty body for a satisfying gulp, full of tropical fruitiness from a high dry hop.
Modern hazy pale. First ever use of Manilita hops, Brand new experimental hop. Notes of Red Grapefruit, Tangerine, White Grape and Pepper.
Session pale ale, with aromas of grapefruit and tropical fruits
Dark chocolate, coffee and liquorice flavours of a dark mild, with a dry bitter-sweet cherry flavour.
Rounded and flavourful with a soft full mouthfeel. Holding flavours of citrus and tropical fruits, with a light herbal note wrapping it all together.

Our Mango Pale boasts a perfectly balanced profile. The subtle bitterness of premium hops harmonises beautifully with the succulent mango flavours creating a refreshing, fruit-forward brew that's perfect for any occasion.

Sonoma encapsulates what we love at Track. A refreshing, sessionable, hazy pale ale to be shared, which shows our love for hops & the pursuit of pale perfection. With a simple malt base & hopped generously with Mosaic, Centennial & Citra it bursts forth with resinous notes of sticky mandarin and grapefruit. It finishes crisp & clean with a soft, pithy bitterness
Pale Ale brewed with Motueka, Mosaic & Simcoe
Hoppy West Coast Pale with Cryo Mosiac, Citra and Mosaic.

Dessert lovers, sit up and sup up. This luscious, dark, and sweet stout immediately garnered attention from both stout lovers and sceptics. Roasty, toasty notes from dark malts combined with the sweetness of molasses and Madagascan vanilla make this the perfect “entry-level” stout for those wishing to venture unknowingly onto the dark side. Once converted, Crème Bearlee will welcome you time and again into its deliciously sweet embrace

crafted with Maris Otter, premium crystal and chocolate malts, and West African fonio, an ancient grain that contributes creaminess and subtle fruit character. Dark brewing sugars further enhance the beer with complex layers of caramel and richness.

Our flagship IPA, Jaipur, already brings a vibrant grapefruit character from its six-hop blend, but we wanted to take that citrus intensity a step further. By adding pink grapefruit, we’re amplifying the fresh, zesty profile to create an even bolder experience. This enhancement brings a new layer of bright, tangy sweetness that perfectly complements the beer’s natural hop bitterness, resulting in a refreshingly balanced and fruit-forward IPA that is bursting with character.

A sessionable beer packed with all the flavour of a modern classic. A full and fluffy mouthfeel assisted by the presence of malted oats, combined with a progressive, well considered dry hop. Expect hits of pineapple and coconut from the Sabro hops, and a clean finish from our American yeast strain.
A delicious modern pale featuring Emperor, Vic Secret, Citra and Chinook. Gentle pine and tropical notes.
Classic DEYA cask formula using a new hop variety called Möst. (Strawberry bubblegum meets citrus and tropical fruit.)
All-day drinker Session IPA. Session by name, session by nature.
ShinDigger BLACK. A foamy dome crown, fit for a King. || MADE IN MANCHESTER || There’s more than one black liquid in town
Full-bodied, well-rounded and slightly sweet on the palate. A generous addition of Mount Hood hops late in the boil result in a delicate fruity aroma.
Thirst Quenching English Hopped Pale Ale
An original premium bitter.
Classic pale/gold Mancunian bitter.
Double dry hopped with Citra, Simcoe, Mosaic. Packed with a ripe, juicy character of mango, peach and pine.

Strawberry, Chocolate & Vanilla Ice Cream SourOur favourite flavours of ice cream are the inspiration for our latest dessert sours, back again in a series of single, double, and triple scoops… Sweet strawberries, rich chocolate, and smooth vanilla combine into a single (but generous) scoop of soft ice cream for a vibrant, fruity flavour and a smooth, luscious mouthfeel.

The true original ginger beer. Based on the traditional recipe founded in Yorkshire in the 1700’s, brewed and fermented with a traditional recipe using only fresh ingredients. It doesn’t get more authentic than this. A drink steeped in History.

The juice is loose! Squeeze The Day is our latest special, combining the creamy characteristics of wheat beer with a zesty orange burst. Plenty of citrus aromas meet with subtle spices from cracked coriander seeds. Smooth and crisp with a zesty and sweet tang, balanced with a gentle hop bitterness. This fruity number is not one to be missed.

gins.description: With local Noble Fir needles and Bladderwrack Seaweed, it leads with juniper and is balanced with hints of forest fir, tropical fruit, citrus spice, tangy sherbet and a subtle scent of the shore.

Heavily awarded, Hepple is the ultimate modern gin, an intense yet elegant reinvention of a classic gin, elevated through our use of botanicals picked fresh from our home in Northumberland and next-generation distilling techniques

The only gin to win 2 double-gold medals at the San Francisco World Spirit Awards in the same year. Selected as one of the Worlds Best 50 Gins. Distilled in the heart of the Macclesfield Forest in batches of 85 bottles at a time, each bottle containing only the finest botanicals and spring water.

We pick ingredients from the local forest such as bilberry, wild raspberry, gorse flower, pine and moss. These are ground by hand in a pestle & mortar with traditional gin ingredients, including Organic Juniper, Organic coriander seed, liquorice and vanilla.
These freshly ground ingredients are then distilled just once in our tiny 30 litre pot still, before the addition of an incredible blend of Earl Grey Tea by Cheshire blenders Quinteassential, along with our own spring water from the ground beneath the distillery.
The resulting spirit retains all of the herbal, earthy flavours of Forest Gin, whilst the addition of the Earl Grey Tea blend adds sumptuous, delicate notes from oolong, cornflowers and Sicilian bergamot

**WINNER OF BEST WELSH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023 AND 2024**The jewel in our crown, award winning Hensol Castle Gin is a traditional copper pot distilled London Dry gin. Juniper led, driven by hand-peeled citrus and our wildflower medley that’s grown in the ground of our own castle. It’s the perfect balance of spice and sweet botanicals

**WINNER OF BEST WELSH FLAVOURED GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2023 AND 2024**Our beautiful pink gin, bursting with wild strawberries and hibiscus flower, is a luscious twist on our classic award-winning Welsh dry gin
Hensol Black. Quite simply, Hensol Dry, flavoured with the highest quality black cherries, black berries and our hand foraged black muscat grapes from our botanical garden of Hensol Castle.

** WINNER OF BEST CONTEMPORARY GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** Our Citrus Forward gin bursts with Cuban pink grapefruit and juicy Sicilian lemons and limes, crafted for those who crave a clean, zesty finish. Now joined by our newest expression, Smoked Berry, a rich blend of ripe berries delicately balanced with a smooth, smoky warmth, perfect for sipping or stirring.

** WINNER OF THE BEST ENGLISH COMPOUND GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** An extraordinary 34 times award-winning gin, made using the traditional method of Cold Compounding (or in layman’s terms – infusing). Very high quality copper pot-still spirit is infused with ingredients including juniper, orange peel, coriander, cassia, cloves and cardamom, with the length of the compounding period controlled entirely by periodic sampling.
The result is an extraordinary gin, lightly tinted by the botanicals, and with a flavour which is both bold, and perfumed all at once. Sure to be a hit with amateur and professional mixologists alike.

** WINNER OF BEST ENGLISH CONTEMPORARY GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** Premium London Dry gin with bold notes of California orange peel and cubeb pepper berries. We carefully combine 11 ingredients to build a deep flavour profile, with strong orange peel front notes followed up by warm, spicy undertones towards the end.

** WINNER OF BEST SCOTTISH CONTEMPORARY GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024**Thompson Bros Organic Mediterranean Gin comprises our base proprietary botanical blend combined with single distillations of fresh seasonal organic Bergamot, Lemon, Orange, Rosemary, Thyme and Bay Leaf.

gins.Gin Name: Wild Atlantic - wild strawberry and elderflower
gins.description: ** WINNER OF BEST IRISH FLAVOURED GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** Our sophisticated strawberry gin, bursting with strawberries and elderflower, is a luscious twist on our classic award winning Wild Atlantic Irish Gin.  A blend of 8 traditional botanicals, hand-crafted by our Master distiller in small batches and then infused with wild strawberries and elderflower.

We decided to create a gin inspired by the botanicals of Corsica and the surrounding Mediterranean area. Joining the classic set of botanicals that we use for Portobello Road London Dry Gin, we also add, bergamot, rosemary, basil and green olive, and we add just a tiny pinch of sea salt after distillation to give it that slight hint of coastal air.

Boe Superior Gin takes its name from Franz de la Boe who first created Gin in 1658, and designed it as a medicine not as the tasty treat we know it as today! This new Superior edition is bottled at 41.5% and holds Refreshing Citrus and Orange notes with hints of Crisp Spicy Juniper and Cardamom!

A blushing gin from Tarsier Sprit, bursting with the floral notes of red dragon fruit, the sweetness of lychee and the tartness of raspberry. Raspberry is prominent but there’s twists and turns on the palate giving this real depth. The Southeast Asian botanicals are really rather delightful and help make this raspberry creation refreshingly unique.

From the base of Tarquin’s Handcrafted Cornish Gin recipe, with a focus on blackberries! They combine the gin with the delicious British blackberries as well as a small helping of Cornish wildflower honey to impart a subtle mellow sweetness.

Edinburgh Gooseberry & Elderflower Gin is a combination of both tangy Gooseberry and sweet Elderflower. The signature Edinburgh Gin, which is distilled using a number of classic gin botanicals, is then infused with gooseberries and elderflowers. The result is a classic gin backbone with balanced aromatic tangy and sweet flavours.

The Botanist is a gin of layered complexity, a progressive exploration of the botanical heritage of our isle of Islay. 22 hand-foraged local botanicals delicately augment nine berries, barks, seeds and peels during an achingly slow distillation. The first Islay dry gin is a rare expression of the heart and soul of our remote Scottish Island.

This premium small batch L'Orange gin has been lovingly created by mixing our London Dry with a generous addition of orange zest. The addition of the orange zest has given our gin a lovely natural citrus finish and not too sweet.

gins.Gin Name: The Edge - Fruits of the Forest
gins.description: A burst of sweetness from the raspberries , blueberries, straw­berries and blackberries. Crisp juniper shines through with warming notes of cinnamon and star anise.
Vibrant with the tangy taste of rhubarb accompanied by heady notes of juniper with a hint of citrus followed by fragrant elderflower and a whisper of warm ginger spice.
Crisp and delicious, juniper lead with a smooth fruity finish.

Introducing our Cherry & Pink Peppercorn Gin, where our signature blend of botanicals meets the bold flavours of sour cherries and pink peppercorns. Delight in its fresh, peppery notes and intensely aromatic character, perfectly complemented by a subtle touch of fruitiness.

Distilled with American Cascade hops and a punch of dried grapefruit for a zesty citrus pine flavour balanced with light floral notes. An undercurrent of juniper delivers a smooth refreshingly hoppy character.

Embark on a flavour journey with our juniper-led Aromatic Spiced Gin, where warm woody sweetness meets tantalising aromatic spiced notes of cassia, cubebs, and sweet orange.
Indulge in its light citrus essence, complemented by juicy mellowness and a delicate hint of aromatic ginger spice derived from cardamon pods. Elevate your Gin and cocktail experience and discover the perfect balance of flavours in every sip.

Crafted with care, our Limited Edition Apple & Honey Gin is a vibrant celebration of spring. Distilled with crisp apples, delicate rose, hibiscus, and the rich sweetness of Hilltop Blossom Honey, it delivers a beautifully balanced flavour. The warmth of juniper shines through, complemented by soft floral notes and a fresh, uplifting finish.

Lovingly hand-crafted in Cheshire, this intriguing yet tried and test combination of flavours epitomises all things British, with floral notes combined with the tart yet sweet taste of the rhubarb makes for a distinctive and moreish gin experience.

Lovingly hand-crafted in Cheshire on Penelope, our 400L still. Sweet berries combine with the juniper to deliver a taste sensation. Complex and fresh with plenty citrus this pink gin delivers on all fronts.

Containing the usual suspects of Juniper and Coriander, add Ginger, Vanilla and Mint along with pure Raspberry Concentrate its delicious.  A palate of Raspberry at the front with Juniper and spices at the back a truly exceptional taste bud explosion.
Containing Seven Signature Botanicals of Juniper, Grapefruit, Kaffir Lime and finally Hibiscus with a citrus kick
Small batch gin distilled and bottled in Cheshire. Distinct flavours of blood orange.

Our multi award-winning Apple Crumble Gin offers tasting notes of juniper, baked apple, cinnamon and rich toasted oats as a perfect gin paired with lighter drinks in summer or warming recipes in the colder months.

GOLD MEDAL 2023 GLOBAL GIN MASTERS
A unique pairing of zesty Italian citrus and soft French apricot
Tasting notes – Bright orange on the nose, exotic flavour and refreshing finish

Limited Edition Seasonal Gin
Tasting notes – Fresh strawberry, floral notes, faint hint of basil & black pepper
Made with organic wild strawberrie

Fresh pine and star anise on the nose
Warming notes of cinnamon, nutmeg and clove
Heavy Juniper flavour, with 3 times the usual amount used
Awards – Gold Medal 2023 Global Gin Masters
London Dry Style- only pure water is added post-distillation

The World’s First Bison Grass Gin – Found nowhere else.
Tasting notes – Aromas of freshly cut summer hay, taste of lemongrass and subtle spice
Further Awards – Double Gold Medal Winner

Distilled with Juniper and sweet orange peel in the pot, with freshly sliced passion fruits in the botanical basket, so the vapour travels through the fruit, picking up the flavour. Pure organic passion fruit juice is blended into the gin to add even more delicious and natural flavour.

Searching for a gin that is both elegant and full of flavour? Our Rhubarb gin is distilled using 8 different botanicals including juniper, rhubarb, cassia and vanilla giving it an intensely fruity palate with a deliciously dry finish

** WINNER OF THE BEST ENGLISH FLAVOURED GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** This citrus-forward tasting experience boasts a vibrant nose of fresh orange peel and persistant lime, leading to a juicy, orange-dominate palette with herbal undertones

** WINNER OF BEST ENGLISH CLASSIC GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** Discover the spirit of Cornwall in every sip. Our 43% Cornish Dry Gin is a bold, juniper-forward expression of traditional British gin-making, handcrafted in small batches right here in the heart of Cornwall.
Distilled using time-honoured methods and locally inspired botanicals, it’s a gin that refuses to compromise – full-bodied, flavourful, and unmistakably Cornish.

** THE WINNER OF THE BEST WELSH LONDON DRY GIN AT THE WORLD GIN AWARDS 2024** GWYR Sea Star Gin- a fresh coastal gin made with foraged Welsh laver seaweed, lemon balm, bergamot and rich crushed Serbian juniper. 
Our GŴYR Sea Star was a Gin Guide Awards 2024 winner in the Coastal Category and has won a Gold Award and Best Welsh London Dry in the World Gin Awards 2024.

Handcrafted in small batches, Caorunn Scottish Raspberry Gin is made with an infusion of Perthshire raspberries in a unique Copper Berry Chamber. 
The nose is fruity with raspberry and soft vanilla. The palate has vibrant fruit notes with raspberry and tart rowanberries, before a pleasantly clean and fresh finish.

The adventure starts on Khao San Road in Bangkok, also known as the backpacking hub of Asia. 412 metres of neon lights, bars, hawkers and the most amazing street food surround us. The aromas of kaffir lime leaf, lemongrass and Thai red chilli fill the air…

Khao San Gin is an expression of this incredible location. To harness the fresh, vibrant flavours of Thai cuisine, Tarsier have cold-distilled Kaffir Lime Leaf, Lemongrass and Thai Red Chilli separately in a vacuum still and blended with a traditional distillate of 10 carefully selected botanicals.

It is relatively easy to make gin, however making great gin requires skill, patience and determination. The same applies for alcohol-free spirits. We go to extraordinary lengths to craft the finest possible liquids, and Sipsmith FreeGlider was no exception. We spent the past two years experimenting with 189 prototypes and over 100 ingredients to create the ultimate alcohol free spirit; one that doesn’t compromise on quality nor flavour.

Tanqueray Flor de Sevilla 0.0% Alcohol-Free is a zesty, fruity spirit, offering a bold and bittersweet taste of the sun-soaked Mediterraneans in a new non-alcoholic version. It allows you to discover the definitive experience from Tanqueray, just without the alcohol.

about:
The Lymm Beer Festival was the brainchild of the Lymm and District Round Table member Chris Stephens. Started in 2011, the Lymm Beer Fest has quickly established itself as a firm favourite with local people and has become one of the three main annual charity events organised by Lymm and District Round Table in order to raise money for local charities and community groups. The other events are the Lymm Charity Duck Race and the Big Lymm Fireworks.

The event will take place in the Lymm Village Hall and will offer many carefully selected real ales, ciders and perries. Lymm Ladies will also be serving a fantastic selection of gins. There will be live music involving a host of talented local bands and singers, and a selection of food to purchase, with all profits going to charity. For those abstaining or driving we will also be offering free soft drinks.
